comments: Write any 8-bit value to this register to reset the mixer chip. After a reset, all the registers will be restored to their default values.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1335,bit[3:1]=Master volume}}3 bits, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps. Default is 4 ⇒ – 11 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1335,bit[3:1]=MIDI volume}}3 bits, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps. Default is 4 ⇒ – 11 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1335,bit[3:1]=CD volume}}3 bits, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 46 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1335,bit[2:1]=Voice volume}}2 bits, giving 4 levels. 0 to 3 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 7 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 46 dB.
Write any 8-bit value to this register to reset the mixer chip. After a reset, all the registers will be restored to their default values.
(CT1345) 3 bits per channel, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps. Default is 4 ⇒ – 11 dB.
(CT1345) 2 bits, giving 4 levels. 0 to 3 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 7 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 46 dB.
(CT1345) 3 bits per channel, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps. Default is 4 ⇒ – 11 dB.
(CT1345) 3 bits per channel, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps. Default is 4 ⇒ – 11 dB.
(CT1345) 3 bits per channel, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 46 dB.
(CT1345) 3 bits per channel, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 46 dB.
Write any 8-bit value to this register to reset the mixer chip. After a reset, all the registers will be restored to their default values.
(CT1745) 4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 15 ⇒ – 60 dB to 0 dB, in 4 dB steps. Default is 12 ⇒ – 12 dB.
(CT1745) 3 bits, giving 8 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 42 dB to 0 dB, in 6 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 48 dB.
(CT1745) 4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 15 ⇒ – 60 dB to 0 dB, in 4 dB steps. Default is 12 ⇒ – 12 dB.
(CT1745) 4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 15 ⇒ – 60 dB to 0 dB, in 4 dB steps. Default is 12 ⇒ – 12 dB.
(CT1745) 4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 15 ⇒ – 60 dB to 0 dB, in 4 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 60 dB.
(CT1745) 4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 15 ⇒ – 60 dB to 0 dB, in 4 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 60 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=Master volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 24 ⇒ – 14 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=Master volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 24 ⇒ – 14 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=Voice volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 24 ⇒ – 14 dB.

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=MIDI volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 24 ⇒ – 14 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=MIDI volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 24 ⇒ – 14 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=CD volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 62 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=CD volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 62 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=Line volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 62 dB.

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:3]=Mic volume}}5 bits per channel, giving 32 levels. 0 to 31 ⇒ – 62 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 62 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:6]=PC Speaker volume}}2 bits, giving 4 levels. 0 to 3 ⇒ – 18 dB to 0 dB, in 6 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ – 18 dB.

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[4]=Line L,bit[3]=Line R,bit[2]=CD L,bit[1]=CD R,bit[0]=Mic}}Set the appropriate bit to 1 to close the switch, 0 to open.{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=default value,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[4]=1,bit[3]=1,bit[2]=1,bit[1]=1,bit[0]=1}}

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[6]=MIDI L,bit[5]=MIDI R,bit[4]=Line L,bit[3]=Line R,bit[2]=CD L,bit[1] = CD R,bit[0]=Mic}}Set the appropriate bit to 1 to close the switch, 0 to open.{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=default value,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[6]=0,bit[5]=0,bit[4]=1,bit[3]=0,bit[2]=1,bit[1]=0,bit[0]=1}}

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[6]=MIDI L,bit[5]=MIDI R,bit[4]=Line L,bit[3]=Line R,bit[2]=CD L,bit[1] = CD R,bit[0]=Mic}}Set the appropriate bit to 1 to close the switch, 0 to open.{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=default value,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[6]=0,bit[5]=0,bit[4]=0,bit[3]=1,bit[2]=0,bit[1]=1,bit[0]=1}}When recording in mono, note that samples will only be taken from the left input mixer. So, if a mono recording of a stereo source is desired, the switches controlled by registers 0x3D and 0x3E must be manipulated to enable both channels of a stereo source to be mixed together first into the left input mixer before being sampled.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:6]=Input Gain L}}2 bits per channel, giving 4 levels. 0 to 3 ⇒ 0 dB to 18 dB, in 6 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ 0 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:6]=Input Gain R}}2 bits per channel, giving 4 levels. 0 to 3 ⇒ 0 dB to 18 dB, in 6 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ 0 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:6]=Output Gain L}}2 bits per channel, giving 4 levels. 0 to 3 ⇒ 0 dB to 18 dB, in 6 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ 0 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:6]=Output Gain R}}2 bits per channel, giving 4 levels. 0 to 3 ⇒ 0 dB to 18 dB, in 6 dB steps. Default is 0 ⇒ 0 dB.
{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[0]=AGC{enum:0=AGC on (default),1=Fixed gain of 20 dB}}}

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:4]=Treble L}}4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 14 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. 8 to 15 ⇒ 0 dB to 14 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 8 ⇒ 0 dB.

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:4]=Treble R}}4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 14 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. 8 to 15 ⇒ 0 dB to 14 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 8 ⇒ 0 dB.

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:4]=Bass L}}4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 14 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. 8 to 15 ⇒ 0 dB to 14 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 8 ⇒ 0 dB.

{bitfield:bits=8,keyhead=,row={bfr:keyval=CT1745,bit[7:4]=Bass R}}4 bits per channel, giving 16 levels. 0 to 7 ⇒ – 14 dB to 0 dB, in 2 dB steps. 8 to 15 ⇒ 0 dB to 14 dB, in 2 dB steps. Default is 8 ⇒ 0 dB.
